Who are we?

Begin Again Ministries is offering hope to women who are or have been affected by substance use disorder. We recognize women need a safe place, specific support and assistance in order to stay clean long enough to begin the process of breaking free from drug use and its’ devastating effects. The Begin Again Transformational program offers sub-acute, non- medical, supportive services throughout the recovery process. We have a 90-day residential program to assist women to reach their recovery goals through on-site non-judgmental, trauma informed, strength focused care.

We believe that treating the body, mind and spirit within a supportive environment is key to freedom from life-controlling substances. We believe every women has God given unique strengths and abilities. Begin Again strives to get each women in touch with those strengths and combine them with the love of Jesus.

Megan's Place

Our residential facility is named Megan’s Place. It is named in the memory of a special young woman and her fight to overcome substance use disorder. Her struggle is the inspiration for our 90 day program, allowing more time for healing and assistance. Her memory is part of our passion to empower every woman to live life free to be all she can be.

Megan’s Place is a safe environment for spiritual, emotional, mental and physical healing. It provides a peaceful atmosphere to reflect, learn and heal. Women have their own private bedroom and bathroom, with a shared living space and kitchen in a newly renovated residential care facility. Day- to-day living necessities and access to Medication Assisted Treatment and counseling is provided as well as classes and recovery groups.

We know that healthy family support is imperative for a sustainable recovery and Megan’s Place has a family room and children’s area. Women will have the opportunity to receive visits from their children and other friends and family members who are linked to their recovery. Whenever possible, we will provide on-site day care.

Visit our pre owned Furniture Store! Where every purchase helps fund Megan's Place.
